name: LabVIEW Virtual Instrument File
summary: Learn about .VI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Virtual instruments can be created from scratch or built from a VI template included with the LabVIEW software.

description: Program created with LabVIEW, a scientific testing and measurement application; referred to as a "virtual instrument" because it imitates the appearance and operation of a physical instrument, such as a multimeter or oscilloscope.
